welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lambesc, a charming city in southern France known for its picturesque streets and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aix-en-Provence Aerodrome Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aix-en-Provence Aerodrome Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marseille Provence Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Marseille Provence Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to log in.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Avignon-Caumont Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
